+    <el:luamain><![CDATA[
+rooms_wide=3
+rooms_high=2
+
+levelw=1+(19*rooms_wide) +5
+levelh=1+(12*rooms_high)
+
+create_world( levelw, levelh)
+enigma.ConserveLevel = 0
+
+fill_floor("fl-hay", 0,0,levelw,levelh)
+
+fa=1
+fb=2
+fc=3
+fd=4
+
+--fa=random(4)
+--fb=random(4)
+--fc=random(4)
+--fd=random(4)
+
+--while fb==fa do
+--   fb=random(4)
+--end
+
+--while fc==fa or fc==fb do
+--   fc=random(4)
+--end
+
+--while fd==fa or fd==fb or fd==fc do
+--   fd=random(4)
+--end
+
+function renderLine( line, pattern)
+    for i=1, strlen(pattern) do
+        local c = strsub( pattern, i, i)
+        if c =="#" then
+            set_stone("st-greenbrown", i-1, line)
+        elseif c =="%" then
+            set_stone("st-invisible", i-1, line)
+            abyss(i-1,line)
+        elseif c == "o" then
+            oxyd( i-1, line)
+        elseif c == "*" then
+            set_stone("st-brownie", i-1, line)
+        elseif c == "F" then
+            set_stone("st-greenbrown", i-1, line)
+        elseif c == "!" then
+            abyss(i-1,line)
+        elseif c == "~" then
+            fill_floor("fl-water", i-1,line, 1,1)
+        elseif c=="z" then
+            set_actor("ac-blackball", i-1,line+.5, {player=0})
+        elseif c == "G" then
+            draw_stones("st-grate1",{i-1,line}, {1,1}, 1)
+        elseif c=="+" then
+            set_stone("st-wood", i-1, line)
+        elseif c=="=" then
+            set_floor("fl-space",i-1,line)
+        elseif c=="A" then
+            if fa==1 then
+                set_floor("fl-bluegreen",i-1,line)
+            elseif fb==1 then
+                set_floor("fl-rough-red",i-1,line)
+            elseif fc==1 then
+                set_floor("fl-sand",i-1,line)
+            elseif fd==1 then
+                set_floor("fl-leaves",i-1,line)
+            end
+        elseif c=="B" then
+            if fa==2 then
+                set_floor("fl-bluegreen",i-1,line)
+            elseif fb==2 then
+                set_floor("fl-rough-red",i-1,line)
+            elseif fc==2 then
+                set_floor("fl-sand",i-1,line)
+            elseif fd==2 then
+                set_floor("fl-leaves",i-1,line)
+            end
+        elseif c=="C" then
+            if fa==3 then
+                set_floor("fl-bluegreen",i-1,line)
+            elseif fb==3 then
+                set_floor("fl-rough-red",i-1,line)
+            elseif fc==3 then
+                set_floor("fl-sand",i-1,line)
+            elseif fd==3 then
+                set_floor("fl-leaves",i-1,line)
+            end
+        elseif c=="D" then
+            if fa==4 then
+                set_floor("fl-bluegreen",i-1,line)
+            elseif fb==4 then
+                set_floor("fl-rough-red",i-1,line)
+            elseif fc==4 then
+                set_floor("fl-sand",i-1,line)
+            elseif fd==4 then
+                set_floor("fl-leaves",i-1,line)
+            end
+        elseif c=="E" then
+            set_floor("fl-sand",i-1,line)
+            set_actor("ac-blackball", i-1,line+.5, {player=0})
+        elseif c=="a" then
+            set_stone("st-fourswitch", i-1,line, {name="switch1", action="callback", target="funcc1"})
+        elseif c=="b" then
+            set_stone("st-fourswitch", i-1,line, {name="switch2", action="callback", target="funcc2"})
+        elseif c=="c" then
+            set_stone("st-fourswitch", i-1,line, {name="switch3", action="callback", target="funcc3"})
+        elseif c=="d" then
+            set_stone("st-fourswitch", i-1,line, {name="switch4", action="callback", target="funcc4"})
+        elseif c=="e" then
+            set_stone("st-fourswitch", i-1,line, {name="switch5", action="callback", target="funcc5"})
+        elseif c=="f" then
+            set_stone("st-fourswitch", i-1,line, {name="switch6", action="callback", target="funcc6"})
+        elseif c=="g" then
+            set_stone("st-fourswitch", i-1,line, {name="switch7", action="callback", target="funcc7"})
+        elseif c=="h" then
+            set_stone("st-fourswitch", i-1,line, {name="switch8", action="callback", target="funcc8"})
+        elseif c=="i" then
+            set_stone("st-fourswitch", i-1,line, {name="switch9", action="callback", target="funcc9"})
+        elseif c=="j" then
+            set_stone("st-fourswitch", i-1,line, {name="switch10", action="callback", target="funcc10"})
+        elseif c=="k" then
+            set_stone("st-fourswitch", i-1,line, {name="switch11", action="callback", target="funcc11"})
+        elseif c=="l" then
+            set_stone("st-fourswitch", i-1,line, {name="switch12", action="callback", target="funcc12"})
+        elseif c=="m" then
+            set_stone("st-fourswitch", i-1,line, {name="switch13", action="callback", target="funcc13"})
+        elseif c=="n" then
+            set_stone("st-fourswitch", i-1,line, {name="switch14", action="callback", target="funcc14"})
+        elseif c=="`" then
+            set_stone("st-fourswitch", i-1,line, {name="switch15", action="callback", target="funcc15"})
+        elseif c=="p" then
+            set_stone("st-fourswitch", i-1,line, {name="switch16", action="callback", target="funcc16"})
+        elseif c=="q" then
+            set_stone("st-fourswitch", i-1,line, {name="switch17", action="callback", target="funcc17"})
+        elseif c=="r" then
+            set_stone("st-fourswitch", i-1,line, {name="switch18", action="callback", target="funcc18"})
+        elseif c == "d" then --1-d
+            set_floor("fl-gradient",  i-1,  line, {type=1})
+        elseif c == "u" then --2-u
+            set_floor("fl-gradient",  i-1,  line, {type=2})
+        elseif c == "U" then --2-u
+            set_floor("fl-gradient",  i-1,  line, {type=2})
+            set_actor("ac-bug",i-.5,line+.5,{mouseforce=0,player=1})
+        elseif c=="1" then
+            set_stone("st-door_b",i-1,line,{name="door1"})
+        elseif c=="2" then
+            set_stone("st-door_b",i-1,line,{name="door2"})
+        elseif c=="3" then
+            doorv( i-1,line, {name="door3"})
+        elseif c=="4" then
+            doorv( i-1,line, {name="door4"})
+        elseif c=="5" then
+            set_item("it-trigger", i-1,line, {invisible=1,action="callback", target="funccblock1"})
+        elseif c=="6" then
+            set_item("it-trigger", i-1,line, {invisible=1,action="callback", target="funccblock2"})
+        elseif c=="7" then
+            set_item("it-trigger", i-1,line, {invisible=1,action="callback", target="funccblock3"})
+        elseif c=="8" then
+            set_item("it-trigger", i-1,line, {invisible=1,action="callback", target="funccblock4"})
+        elseif c=="9" then
+            set_item("it-trigger", i-1,line, {invisible=1,action="callback", target="funccblock5"})
+        elseif c=="0" then
+            set_item("it-trigger", i-1,line, {invisible=1,action="callback", target="funccblock6"})
+        elseif c=="H" then
+            set_item("it-trigger", i-1,line, {invisible=1,action="callback", target="funccblock7"})
+        end
+    end    
+end
+
+-- Floor:  " "
+-- Border: "#"
+-- Oxyd:   "o"
+
+renderLine(00,"##########################################################")
+renderLine(01,"#                  #AAAAAAAABBAAAAAAAA#G GFG G G G G0G0#o#")
+renderLine(02,"#                  #BCCCCCCDAADCCCCCCB#G G G G GFGFG5*0# #")
+renderLine(03,"#                  #ADAAAABDBBDBAAAADA#GFG G G G G G0G0# #")
+renderLine(04,"#                  #ABBCCDCDDDDCDCCBBA#G G GFG G GFG0*0# #")
+renderLine(05,"#                  #CACDBBCCDDCCBBDCAC#GFG G G G G G6G0# #")
+renderLine(06,"#                   DCDADCDBCCBDCDADCD3G G G G GFG G7*H4 #")
+renderLine(07,"#                  #CCDADCAADDAACDADCC#G GFG GFG G G0G0# #")
+renderLine(08,"#                  #BBDADDABAABADDADBB#G G G GFG G G0*8# #")
+renderLine(09,"#                  #DDCAAACDDDDCAAACDD#GFG GFG G G G0G0# #")
+renderLine(10,"#                  #DCDACADCDDCDACADCD#G G GFG GFG G0*0# #")
+renderLine(11,"#abcdefghijklmn`pqr#AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA#G G G GFG G G0G9#o#")  --  CCDDADDCCCCDDADDCC
+renderLine(12,"#UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU#########12############################")
+renderLine(13,"%!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!#  #!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!%")
+renderLine(14,"%!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!#  #!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!%")
+renderLine(15,"%!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!#  #!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!%")
+renderLine(16,"%!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!##  ##!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!%")
+renderLine(17,"%!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!#    #!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!%")
+renderLine(18,"%!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!#  z #!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!%")
+renderLine(19,"%!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!#    #!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!%")
+renderLine(20,"%!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!######!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!%")
+renderLine(21,"%!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!%")
+renderLine(22,"%!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!%")
+renderLine(23,"%!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!%")
+renderLine(24,"%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%")
+
+oxyd_shuffle()
+
+door1=enigma.GetNamedObject("door1")
+door2=enigma.GetNamedObject("door2")
+door3=enigma.GetNamedObject("door3")
+door4=enigma.GetNamedObject("door4")
+
+fb1=0
+function funccblock1()
+    if fb1==0 then
+        fb1=1
+    else
+        fb1=0
+    end
+end
+
+fb2=0
+function funccblock2()

+        fb2=1
+    else
+        fb2=0

+end

+function funccblock7()
+    if fb1==1 and fb2==1 and fb3==1 and fb4==1 and fb5==1 then
+        enigma.SendMessage(door4,"open",nil)
+    end
+end
+
+f1=1
+function funcc1()
+    f1=f1+1
+    if f1==1 then
+        floor1(20)
+    elseif f1==2 then
+        floor2(20)
+    elseif f1==3 then

+f19=0
+
+function funcc19()  --  CCDDADDCCCCDDADDCC
+    --   set_floor("fl-abyss",fa,(f14+2))
+    --         set_floor("fl-water",fa,(f5+2))
+    --         set_stone("st-grate1",fc,(f1+2))
+    ff1=f1-2
+    while ff1<2 do
+        ff1=ff1+4
+    end
+
+    ff2=f2-2
+    while ff2<2 do
+        ff2=ff2+4
+    end
+
+    ff3=f3-2
+    while ff3<2 do
+        ff3=ff3+4
+    end
+
+    ff4=f4-2
+    while ff4<2 do
+        ff4=ff4+4
+    end
+
+    ff5=f5-2
+    while ff5<2 do
+        ff5=ff5+4
+    end
+
+    ff6=f6-2
+    while ff6<2 do
+        ff6=ff6+4
+    end
+
+    ff7=f7-2
+    while ff7<2 do
+        ff7=ff7+4
+    end
+
+    ff8=f8-2
+    while ff8<2 do
+        ff8=ff8+4
+    end
+
+    ff9=f9-2
+    while ff9<2 do
+        ff9=ff9+4
+    end
+
+    ff10=f10-2
+    while ff10<2 do
+        ff10=ff10+4
+    end
+
+    ff11=f11-2
+    while ff11<2 do
+        ff11=ff11+4
+    end
+
+    ff12=f12-2
+    while ff12<2 do
+        ff12=ff12+4
+    end
+
+    ff13=f13-2
+    while ff13<2 do
+        ff13=ff13+4
+    end
+
+    ff14=f14-2
+    while ff14<2 do
+        ff14=ff14+4
+    end
+
+    ff15=f15-2
+    while ff15<2 do
+        ff15=ff15+4
+    end
+
+    ff16=f16-2
+    while ff16<2 do
+        ff16=ff16+4
+    end
+
+    ff17=f17-2
+    while ff17<2 do
+        ff17=ff17+4
+    end
+
+    ff18=f18-2
+    while ff18<2 do
+        ff18=ff18+4
+    end
+    --  CCDDADDCCCCDDADDCC
+    --   if fa==(ff5-2) and fa==(ff14-2) and fc==(ff1-2) and fc==(ff2-2) and fd==(ff3-2) and fc==(ff8-2) and fc==(ff9-2) and fc==(ff10-2) and fc==(ff11-2) and fd==(ff16-2) and fc==(ff17-2) and fc==(ff18-2) and fd==(ff4-2) and fd==(ff6-2) and fd==(ff7-2) and fd==(ff12-2) and fd==(ff13-2) and fd==(ff15-2) then
+    if f1==3 and f2==3 and f3==0 and f4==0 and f5==1 and f6==0 and f7==0 and f8==3 and f9==3 and f10==3 and f11==3 and f12==0 and f13==0 and f14==1 and f15==0 and f16==0 and f17==3 and f18==3 then
+
+    --if (ff1-fc)==2 and (ff2-fc)==2 then
+    --if fa==(ff5-2) and fa==(ff14-2) and fc==(ff1-2) then
+
+    enigma.SendMessage(door3,"open",nil)
+    f19=1
+    else
+        if f19==1 then
+            enigma.SendMessage(door3,"close",nil)
+            f19=0
+        end
+    end
+end
+
+function floor1(x)
+   set_floor("fl-bluegreen",x,11)
+end
+
+function floor2(x)
+    set_floor("fl-rough-red",x,11)
+end
+
+function floor3(x)
+    set_floor("fl-sand",x,11)
+end
+
+function floor4(x)
+    set_floor("fl-leaves",x,11)
+end
+
+tt=0
+
+ft=0
+
+function timer_callback()
+    if ft==0 then
+        tt=tt+1
+        if tt==2 then
+            set_floor("fl-gradient",  2,  12, {type=1})
+            set_floor("fl-gradient",  6,  12, {type=1})
+            set_floor("fl-gradient",  13,  12, {type=1})
+            set_floor("fl-gradient",  17,  12, {type=1})
+        elseif tt==3 then
+            set_floor("fl-gradient",  3,  12, {type=1})
+            set_floor("fl-gradient",  7,  12, {type=1})
+            set_floor("fl-gradient",  12,  12, {type=1})
+            set_floor("fl-gradient",  16,  12, {type=1})
+        elseif tt==5 then
+            set_floor("fl-gradient",  4,  12, {type=1})
+            set_floor("fl-gradient",  8,  12, {type=1})
+            set_floor("fl-gradient",  11,  12, {type=1})
+            set_floor("fl-gradient",  15,  12, {type=1})
+        elseif tt==6 then
+            set_floor("fl-gradient",  1,  12, {type=1})
+            set_floor("fl-gradient",  5,  12, {type=1})
+            set_floor("fl-gradient",  9,  12, {type=1})
+            set_floor("fl-gradient",  10,  12, {type=1})
+            set_floor("fl-gradient",  14,  12, {type=1})
+            set_floor("fl-gradient",  18,  12, {type=1})
+        elseif tt==20 then
+            draw_stones("st-greenbrown",{1,12}, {1,0}, 18)
+            fill_floor("fl-hay", 1,12, 18,1)
+        elseif tt==21 then
+            enigma.SendMessage(door1,"open",nil)
+            enigma.SendMessage(door2,"open",nil)
+            ft=1
+            tt=0
+        end
+    end
+end
+
+set_stone("st-timer", 59,0, {loop=1, action="callback", target="timer_callback", interval=0.1})
+    ]]></el:luamain>
+    <el:i18n>
+      <el:string el:key="title">
+        <el:english el:translate="false"/>
+      </el:string>
+    </el:i18n>
+  </el:protected>
+</el:level>

+      <el:version el:score="1" el:release="1" el:revision="0" el:status="released"/>

+rooms_wide=6
+rooms_high=2
+
+levelw=1+(19*rooms_wide)
+levelh=1+(12*rooms_high)
+
+create_world( levelw, levelh)
+
+fill_floor("fl-water", 0,0,levelw,levelh)
+
+function renderLine( line, pattern)
+    for i=1, strlen(pattern) do
+        local c = strsub( pattern, i, i)
+        if c =="#" then
+            set_stone( "st-death", i-1, line)
+        elseif c == "o" then
+            oxyd( i-1, line)
+            fill_floor("fl-metal", i-1,line, 1,1)
+        elseif c == "*" then
+            set_stone( "st-greenbrown", i-1, line)
+        elseif c == "!" then
+            fill_floor("fl-water", i-1,line, 1,1)
+        elseif c=="z" then
+            set_actor("ac-blackball", i-.5,line+.5, {player=0})
+            fill_floor("fl-metal", i-1,line, 1,1)
+        elseif c == "s" then
+            set_item("it-spring1",i-1,line)
+            fill_floor("fl-metal", i-1,line,1,1)
+        elseif c=="+" then
+            set_stone( "st-wood", i-1, line)
+        elseif c=="x" then
+            fill_floor("fl-metal", i-1,line, 1,1)
+        elseif c == "R" then
+            set_stone("st-bolder", i-1,line, {name="bolder1",direction=EAST})
+        elseif c == "S" then
+            set_stone("st-bolder", i-1,line, {name="bolder2",direction=SOUTH})
+        elseif c == "U" then
+            set_stone("st-bolder", i-1,line, {direction=NORTH})
+        elseif c == "u" then
+            set_item("it-trigger", i-1,line, {action="callback", target="funccb1"})
+        elseif c == "r" then
+            set_item("it-trigger", i-1,line, {action="callback", target="funccb2"})
+        elseif c == "d" then
+            set_item("it-trigger", i-1,line, {action="callback", target="funccb3"})
+        elseif c == "l" then
+            set_item("it-trigger", i-1,line, {action="callback", target="funccb4"})
+        elseif c == "N" then
+            set_item("it-trigger", i-1,line, {action="callback", target="funccb5"})
+        elseif c == "t" then
+            set_item("it-trigger", i-1,line, {invisible=1,action="callback", target="funccb1"})
+        elseif c == "w" then
+            set_item("it-trigger", i-1,line, {invisible=1,action="callback", target="funccb2"})
+        elseif c == "f" then
+            set_item("it-trigger", i-1,line, {invisible=1,action="callback", target="funccb3"})
+        elseif c == "y" then
+            set_item("it-trigger", i-1,line, {invisible=1,action="callback", target="funccb4"})
+        elseif c=="e" then
+            set_stone("st-oneway", i-1,line, {orientation=enigma.EAST})
+        elseif c == "F" then
+            set_item("it-flagblack",i-1,line)
+            fill_floor("fl-metal", i-1,line, 1,1)
+        end
+    end    
+end
+
+-- Floor:  " "
+-- Border: "#"
+-- Oxyd:   "o"
+
+renderLine(00,"###################################################################################################################")
+renderLine(01,"#wwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwf#")

+renderLine(03,"#w                             xxx      xxx        xx    xxxx     xx           xxx                  xxxx    r  d f#")
+renderLine(04,"#wxxxxx            xx           xx    xxxxx        xxx    xxx     xxxx         xxx   xx      xxx     xxx         f#")
+renderLine(05,"#wxxxxx  xxxx      xx                 xxxx                        xxxx              xxxx     xxxxx         xxxx  f#")

+renderLine(07,"#wxxxxx  xxxx   xx   r xxxx   xxxxx   u      xxx    x   x                   xxx     xxx       xx            xxx  f#")
+renderLine(08,"#wxxxxx         xx     xxxx     xxxx        xxxxx   x r x     u      xx    xxxx                       xxx        f#")
+renderLine(09,"#w                 r u xxxx                 xxxxx       x            xxx   xxx            r         xxxxx   u xx f#")
+renderLine(10,"#w                                           xxxx   xxxxx            xxx                             xxx      xx f#")
+renderLine(11,"#w wwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwf x f#")
+renderLine(12,"## ##########################################################################################################f x f#")
+renderLine(13,"#* *******fyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyy x f#")
+renderLine(14,"#  f xxxo*      xxxxx    d                 l                                        xxx                          f#")
+renderLine(15,"#  f xxxo*       xxx                          x                               xxxx  xxx                          f#")
+renderLine(16,"#  f *****  xxx                       xxx   xxx           xxx                 xxx                      xxx   xxx f#")

+
+oxyd_shuffle()
+
+bolder1=enigma.GetNamedObject("bolder1")
+bolder2=enigma.GetNamedObject("bolder2")
+
+d=0
+
+function funccb1()
+    if d==0 then
+        set_attribs(enigma.GetNamedObject("bolder1"), {direction=NORTH})
+    end
+end
+
+function funccb2()
+    if d==0 then
+        set_attribs(enigma.GetNamedObject("bolder1"), {direction=EAST})
+    end
+end
+
+function funccb3()
+    if d==0 then
+        set_attribs(enigma.GetNamedObject("bolder1"), {direction=SOUTH})
+    end
+end
+
+function funccb4()
+    if d==0 then
+        set_attribs(enigma.GetNamedObject("bolder1"), {direction=WEST})
+    end
+end
+
+function funccb5()
+    if d==0 then
+        set_attribs(enigma.GetNamedObject("bolder1"), {direction=NORTH})
+        set_attribs(enigma.GetNamedObject("bolder2"), {direction=NORTH})
+    end
+    d=1
+end

+rooms_wide=3
+rooms_high=4
+
+levelw=1+(19*rooms_wide)
+levelh=1+(12*rooms_high)
+
+create_world(levelw, levelh)
+
+draw_border("st-brownie")
+fill_floor("fl-hay", 0,0, level_width,level_height)
+
+function renderLine( line, pattern)
+    for i=1, strlen(pattern) do
+        local c = strsub( pattern, i, i)
+        if c =="#" then
+            set_stone( "st-greenbrown", i-1, line)
+        elseif c == "o" then
+            oxyd( i-1, line)
+        elseif c == "i" then
+            set_stone( "st-invisible", i-1, line)
+        elseif c == "h" then
+            set_item("it-trigger", i-1,line, {action="openclose",target="door1"})
+        elseif c == "H" then
+            set_stone("st-door", i-1, line , {name="door1", type="v"})
+        elseif c == "+" then
+            set_stone("st-wood", i-1, line)
+        elseif c == "*" then
+            set_stone("st-brownie", i-1, line)
+        elseif c == "g" then
+            draw_stones("st-grate1",{i-1,line}, {1,1}, 1)
+        elseif c == "a" then
+            set_stone("st-bolder", i-1,line, {direction=NORTH})
+        elseif c == "b" then
+            set_stone("st-bolder", i-1,line, {direction=EAST})
+        elseif c == "c" then
+            set_stone("st-bolder", i-1,line, {direction=WEST})
+        elseif c == "d" then
+            set_stone("st-bolder", i-1,line, {direction=SOUTH})
+        elseif c == "1" then
+            oneway(i-1,line, enigma.NORTH)
+        elseif c == "4" then
+            oneway(i-1,line, enigma.SOUTH)
+        elseif c == "3" then
+            oneway(i-1,line, enigma.WEST)
+        elseif c == "2" then
+            oneway(i-1,line, enigma.EAST)
+        elseif c == "~" then
+            fill_floor("fl-water", i-1,line, 1,1)
+        elseif c == "!" then
+            abyss(i-1,line)
+        elseif c == "@" then
+            document(i-1,line,"I'ts a race!")
+        elseif c == "s" then
+            set_stone("st-stoneimpulse",i-1,line)
+        elseif c == "x" then
+            set_item("it-blackbomb",i-1,line)
+        elseif c == "y" then
+            dynamite(i-1,line)
+        elseif c == "z" then    
+            set_actor("ac-blackball" ,i-1, line, {player=0})
+        end
+    end
+end
+
+-- Floor:  " "
+-- Border: "#"
+-- Oxyd:   "o"
+
+renderLine(00,"##########################################################")
+renderLine(01,"#   o################ ######   #### i #####              #")

@@ -0,0 +1,169 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no" ?>
+<el:level xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://enigma-game.org/schema/level/1 level.xsd" xmlns:el="http://enigma-game.org/schema/level/1">
+  <el:protected>
+    <el:info el:type="level">
+      <el:identity el:title="Double Oneways" el:subtitle="no U-turn" el:id="duffy172"/>
+      <el:version el:score="1" el:release="1" el:revision="0" el:status="released"/>
+      <el:author  el:name="Jacob Scott" el:email="" el:homepage=""/>
+      <el:copyright>Copyright ? 2007 Jacob Scott</el:copyright>
+      <el:license el:type="GPL v2.0 or above" el:open="true"/>
+      <el:compatibility el:enigma="0.92">
+      </el:compatibility>
+      <el:modes el:easy="false" el:single="true" el:network="false"/>
+      <el:score el:easy="-" el:difficult="-"/>
+    </el:info>
+    <el:luamain><![CDATA[
+rooms_wide=14
+rooms_high=1
+
+levelw=1+(19*rooms_wide)
+levelh=1+(12*rooms_high)
+
+create_world( levelw, levelh)
+
+fill_floor("fl-metal", 0,0,levelw,levelh)
+
+function renderLine( line, pattern)
+    for i=1, strlen(pattern) do
+        local c = strsub( pattern, i, i)
+        if c =="#" then
+            set_stone( "st-greenbrown", i-1, line)
+        elseif c =="B" then
+            set_stone( "st-actorimpulse", i-1, line)
+        elseif c =="K" then
+            set_stone( "st-stoneimpulse", i-1, line)
+        elseif c =="t" then
+            set_stone( "st-rock6",i-1,line)
+        elseif c =="M" then
+            set_stone( "st-greenbrown", i-1, line)
+            set_item("it-wormhole", i-1, line, {strength=1,targetx="259.5",targety="6.5"})
+        elseif c =="N" then
+            set_item("it-wormhole", i-1, line, {strength=1,targetx="8.5",targety="3.5"})
+        elseif c == "o" then
+            oxyd( i-1, line)
+        elseif c == "!" then
+            abyss(i-1,line)
+        elseif c=="+" then
+            set_stone( "st-greenbrown", i-1, line)
+        elseif c=="g" then
+            draw_stones("st-grate1",{i-1,line}, {1,1}, 1)
+        elseif c=="l" then
+            oneway(i-1,line, enigma.WEST)
+        elseif c=="u" then
+            oneway(i-1,line, enigma.NORTH)
+        elseif c=="r" then
+            oneway(i-1,line, enigma.EAST)
+        elseif c=="d" then
+            oneway(i-1,line, enigma.SOUTH)
+        elseif c=="c" then    
+            set_item("it-coin1", i-1,line)
+        elseif c=="z" then
+            set_actor("ac-blackball", i-0.5,line+0.5, {player=0})
+        elseif c=="g" then
+            draw_stones("st-grate1",{i-1,line}, {1,1}, 1)
+        elseif c=="S" then
+            set_item("it-seed", i-1, line)
+        elseif c == "7" then
+            puzzle(i-1,line,PUZ_0110)
+        elseif c == "9" then
+            puzzle(i-1,line,PUZ_0011)
+        elseif c == "3" then
+            puzzle(i-1,line,PUZ_1001)
+        elseif c == "1" then
+            puzzle(i-1,line,PUZ_1100)
+        elseif c == "h" then
+            puzzle(i-1,line,PUZ_0101)
+        elseif c == "v" then
+            puzzle(i-1,line,PUZ_1010)
+        elseif c == "8" then
+            puzzle(i-1,line,PUZ_1000)
+        elseif c == "6" then
+            puzzle(i-1,line,PUZ_0100)
+        elseif c == "2" then
+            puzzle(i-1,line,PUZ_0010)
+        elseif c == "4" then
+            puzzle(i-1,line,PUZ_0001)
+        elseif c=="s" then
+            fill_floor("fl-space", i-1,line, 1,1)
+        elseif c=="L" then
+            fill_floor("fl-leaves", i-1,line, 37,11)
+        elseif c=="R" then
+            fill_floor("fl-rough", i-1,line, 18,11)
+        elseif c=="Y" then
+            fill_floor("fl-abyss", i-1,line, 94,4)
+        elseif c=="Q" then
+            fill_floor("fl-abyss", i-1,line, 92,4)
+        elseif c=="i" then
+            fill_floor("fl-ice", i-1,line, 1,1)
+        elseif c=="P" then
+            set_item("it-brush",i-1,line)
+        elseif c=="e" then
+            set_item("it-extralife",i-1,line)
+        elseif c=="F" then
+            set_stone("st-switch", i-1,line, {action="callback",target="funcc2"})
+        elseif c=="x" then
+            draw_stones("st-stonebrush", {i-1,line}, {1,0},1)
+        elseif c=="A" then
+            set_stone("st-coinslot", i-1,line, {action="openclose", target="door1"})
+        elseif c=="a" then
+            doorv( i-1,line, {name="door1"})
+        elseif c=="X" then
+            set_stone("st-switch", i-1,line, {action="callback",target="funcc1"})
+        end
+    end    
+end
+
+-- Floor:  " "
+-- Border: "#"
+-- Oxyd:   "o"
+
+renderLine(00,"####################Y                                                                                             ####################Y                                                                                             #######################################")
+renderLine(01,"#R   x     x       #                                                                                              #isisisisisisis#sis#                                                                                              #L #o#o#o#o#o#o#o#o#A                 #")
+renderLine(02,"# xx x xxx x x xxx+#                                                                                              #s##isisisisisi#i#i#                                                                                              #  #u#u#u#u#u#u#u#u#                  #")
+renderLine(03,"# x    x   x x     #                                                                                              #is#sisisBsisis#s#s#                                                                                              #  #u#u#u#u#u#u#u#u#                  #")
+renderLine(04,"# x xx xxx x x xx x#tttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttt##i#isisisisisi#i#i#tttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttt#                  #####         SSSS #")
+renderLine(05,"# x x   x  x x x   l                                                                                              l s#sisisisisisis# l                                                                                              l                  #   #         SSSS #")
+renderLine(06,"# xxx x x xx xxx xx#tttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttt####################tttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttt#          z       # N a     c   SSSS #") 
+renderLine(07,"#   xMx+x    x xPx r                                                                                              r   #   2   2    #!r                                                                                              r                  #   #         SSSS #")
+renderLine(08,"#xx x x xxxxxx xxx #tttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttt# # #7h4v   14    !# ttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttt#                  #####         SSSS #")
+renderLine(09,"#   x    x x       #Y                                                                                             #e#6h3      7hh4  !# tQ                                                                                           #  #d#d#d#d#d#d#d#d#                  #")
+renderLine(10,"# xxxx xxx   xxxxxx#                                                                                              #e#     8   8   2  # t                                                                                            #  #d#d#d#d#d#d#d#d#                  #")
+renderLine(11,"#          x       #                                                                                              #F#     #       8  #Xt                                                                                            #  #o#o#o#o#o#o#o#o#A                 #")
+renderLine(12,"####################                                                                                              ####################tt                                                                                            #######################################")
+
+oxyd_shuffle()
+
+through=0
+function funcc1()
+    if through==0 then
+        --set_stone( "st-brownie",12 , 2)
+        set_stone( "st-brownie",18 , 2)
+        --set_stone( "st-brownie",3, 6)
+        set_stone( "st-brownie",7 , 7)
+        --set_stone( "st-brownie",4, 9)
+        set_stone( "st-brownie",5, 7)
+        through=1
+    end
+end
+
+through2=0
+function funcc2()
+    if through2==0 then
+        set_stone( "st-greenbrown",124 ,5)
+        set_stone( "st-greenbrown",125 ,5)
+        set_stone( "st-greenbrown",126 ,5)
+        set_stone( "st-greenbrown",127 ,5)
+        set_stone( "st-grate1",125 ,6) 
+        set_stone( "st-grate1",126 ,6)    
+        fill_floor("fl-metal", 124,6,4,2)    
+        through2=1
+    end
+end    ]]></el:luamain>
+    <el:i18n>

+        <el:english el:translate="false"/>
+      </el:string>
+    </el:i18n>
+  </el:protected>
+</el:level>

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no" ?>
+<el:level xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://enigma-game.org/schema/level/1 level.xsd" xmlns:el="http://enigma-game.org/schema/level/1">
+  <el:protected>
+    <el:info el:type="level">
+      <el:identity el:title="Wood - Water - Wood" el:subtitle="" el:id="duffy173"/>
+      <el:version el:score="1" el:release="1" el:revision="0" el:status="released"/>
+      <el:author  el:name="Jacob Scott" el:email="" el:homepage=""/>
+      <el:copyright>Copyright ? 2007 Jacob Scott</el:copyright>
+      <el:license el:type="GPL v2.0 or above" el:open="true"/>
+      <el:compatibility el:enigma="0.92">
+      </el:compatibility>
+      <el:modes el:easy="false" el:single="true" el:network="false"/>
+      <el:score el:easy="-" el:difficult="-"/>
+    </el:info>
+    <el:luamain><![CDATA[
+rooms_wide=2
+rooms_high=1
+
+levelw=1+(19*rooms_wide)
+levelh=1+(12*rooms_high)
+
+create_world( levelw, levelh)
+
+fill_floor("fl-hay", 0,0,levelw,levelh)
+
+function renderLine( line, pattern)
+    for i=1, strlen(pattern) do
+        local c = strsub( pattern, i, i)
+        if c =="#" then
+            set_stone( "st-greenbrown", i-1, line)
+        elseif c =="&" then
+            set_stone( "st-greenbrown", i-1, line)
+            fill_floor("fl-water", i-1,line, 1,1)
+        elseif c =="X" then
+            set_stone( "st-death", i-1, line)
+        elseif c == "o" then
+            oxyd( i-1, line)
+        elseif c == "*" then
+            set_stone( "st-brownie", i-1, line)
+        elseif c == "!" then
+            abyss(i-1,line)
+        elseif c == "~" then
+            fill_floor("fl-water", i-1,line, 1,1)
+        elseif c=="z" then
+            set_actor("ac-blackball", i-1,line, {player=0})
+        elseif c == "g" then
+            draw_stones("st-grate1",{i-1,line}, {1,1}, 1)
+            set_floor("fl-normal",i-1,line)
+        elseif c=="+" then
+            set_stone( "st-wood", i-1, line)
+        elseif c=="d" then
+            set_stone("st-oneway", i-1,line, {orientation=enigma.SOUTH})    
+        elseif c=="l" then
+            set_stone("st-oneway", i-1,line, {orientation=enigma.WEST})
+        elseif c=="r" then
+            set_stone("st-oneway", i-1,line, {orientation=enigma.EAST})
+        elseif c=="u" then
+            set_stone("st-oneway", i-1,line, {orientation=enigma.NORTH})
+        end
+    end    
+end
+
+-- Floor:  " "
+-- Border: "#"
+-- Oxyd:   "o"
+
+renderLine(00,"####################################o##")
+renderLine(01,"#  ++  +  + + ++ + #~~~~&~~~~ ++  +   #")
+renderLine(02,"# z+ ++ ++ + + +++  ~~~~&~~~~ + ++ ####")
+renderLine(03,"#++++ ++ ++ ++++ +  ~~~~&~~~~ ++  +   #")
+renderLine(04,"# + ++  +  +  + ++  g~~~~~~~~ + ++  o #")
+renderLine(05,"# ++  +++ + ++ ++ + ~~~~&~~~~ ++  +   #")
+renderLine(06,"#+  +++  +++ ++ +   ~~~~&~~~~ + +++####")
+renderLine(07,"#++ + ++ + +++ +++  ~~~~&~~~~ ++  +   #")
+renderLine(08,"# ++ + ++ +   ++ +  g~~~~~~~~ + ++  o #")
+renderLine(09,"# + ++++  + ++  ++  ~~~~&~~~~ ++  +   #")
+renderLine(10,"#+  + +  + +  +++   ~~~~&~~~~ + ++ ####")
+renderLine(11,"# ++ + ++  + +   + #~~~~&~~~~ ++  +   #")
+renderLine(12,"####################################o##")
+
+oxyd_shuffle()    ]]></el:luamain>

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no" ?>
+<el:level xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://enigma-game.org/schema/level/1 level.xsd" xmlns:el="http://enigma-game.org/schema/level/1">
+  <el:protected>
+    <el:info el:type="level">
+      <el:identity el:title="Transpositions" el:subtitle="" el:id="duffy174"/>
+      <el:version el:score="1" el:release="1" el:revision="1" el:status="released"/>
+      <el:author  el:name="Jacob Scott" el:email="" el:homepage=""/>
+      <el:copyright>Copyright ? 2007 Jacob Scott</el:copyright>
+      <el:license el:type="GPL v2.0 or above" el:open="true"/>
+      <el:compatibility el:enigma="1.00">
+      </el:compatibility>
+      <el:modes el:easy="false" el:single="true" el:network="true"/>
+      <el:score el:easy="-" el:difficult="-"/>
+    </el:info>
+    <el:luamain><![CDATA[
+rooms_wide=4
+rooms_high=1
+
+levelw=61
+levelh=1+(12*rooms_high)
+
+create_world( levelw, levelh)
+enigma.TwoPlayerGame = 1
+
+fill_floor("fl-marble", 0,0,levelw,levelh)
+
+function renderLine( line, pattern)
+    for i=1, strlen(pattern) do
+        local c = strsub( pattern, i, i)
+        if c =="#" then
+            set_stone( "st-marble", i-1, line)
+        elseif c =="%" then
+            set_stone( "st-marble", i-1, line)
+            abyss(i-1,line)
+        elseif c =="$" then
+            set_stone( "st-marble", i-1, line)
+            set_floor("fl-water",i-1,line)
+        elseif c == "o" then
+            oxyd( i-1, line)
+        elseif c == "*" then
+            set_stone( "st-brownie", i-1, line)
+        elseif c == "!" then
+            abyss(i-1,line)
+        elseif c == "~" then
+            set_floor("fl-water",i-1,line)
+        elseif c=="z" then
+            set_actor("ac-blackball", i-.5,line+.5, {player=0})
+            set_item("it-yinyang",i-1,line)
+        elseif c=="y" then
+            set_actor("ac-whiteball", i-.5,line+.5, {player=1})
+            set_item("it-yinyang",i-1,line)
+        elseif c=="Z" then
+            set_item("it-flagblack",i-1,line)
+        elseif c=="Y" then
+            set_item("it-flagwhite",i-1,line)
+        elseif c=="O" then
+            set_item("it-extralife",i-1,line)
+        elseif c == "g" then
+            draw_stones("st-grate1",{i-1,line}, {1,1}, 1)
+        elseif c=="+" then
+            set_stone( "st-wood", i-1, line)
+        elseif c=="=" then
+            set_floor("fl-space",i-1,line)
+        elseif c=="q" then
+            set_floor("fl-swamp",i-1,line)
+        elseif c=="b" then
+            set_stone("st-black1",i-1,line)
+        elseif c=="w" then
+            set_stone("st-white1",i-1,line)
+        elseif c=="Q" then
+            set_stone("st-yinyang1",i-1,line)
+        elseif c=="/" then
+            set_stone("st-yinyang2",i-1,line)
+        elseif c=="B" then
+            set_stone("st-yinyang1",i-1,line)
+        elseif c=="W" then
+            set_stone("st-yinyang1",i-1,line)
+        elseif c=="N" then
+            set_stone("st-mail-n",i-1,line)
+        elseif c=="E" then
+            set_stone("st-mail-w",i-1,line)
+        elseif c=="S" then
+            set_stone("st-mail-s",i-1,line)
+        elseif c=="W" then
+            set_stone("st-mail-w",i-1,line)
+        elseif c=="h" then
+            set_item("it-pipe-h",i-1,line)
+        elseif c=="v" then
+            set_item("it-pipe-v",i-1,line)
+        elseif c=="c" then
+            set_item("it-crack3",i-1,line)
+        elseif c=="r" then
+            set_stone("st-oneway", i-1,line, {orientation=enigma.EAST})
+        elseif c=="u" then
+            set_stone("st-oneway", i-1,line, {orientation=enigma.NORTH})
+        elseif c=="d" then
+            set_stone("st-oneway", i-1,line, {orientation=enigma.SOUTH})
+        elseif c=="R" then
+            set_stone("st-oneway_black", i-1,line, {orientation=enigma.EAST})
+        elseif c=="6" then
+            set_stone("st-oneway_white", i-1,line, {orientation=enigma.EAST})
+        elseif c=="A" then
+            set_item("it-vortex-open", i-1, line, {targetx="37.5",targety="9.5"})
+        elseif c=="`" then
+            set_item("it-vortex-open", i-1, line, {targetx="32.5",targety="3.5"})
+        elseif c=="C" then
+            set_item("it-vortex-open", i-1, line, {targetx="37.5",targety="3.5"})
+        elseif c=="D" then
+            set_item("it-vortex-open", i-1, line, {targetx="32.5",targety="9.5"})
+        elseif c==";" then
+            set_stone("st-puzzle-e",i-1,line)
+        elseif c==":" then
+            set_stone("st-puzzle-w",i-1,line)
+            abyss(i-1,line)
+        elseif c=="1" then
+            set_stone("st-white4",i-1,line)
+            set_item("it-flagblack",i-1,line)
+        elseif c=="2" then
+            set_stone("st-black4",i-1,line)
+            set_item("it-flagwhite",i-1,line)
+        end
+    end
+end
+
+renderLine(00,"#############################################################")
+renderLine(01,"#       !!!    !!!!  Q  O6   R ggg!!ggg !!!!!  wwWwQQ   bbb #")

+renderLine(05,"#!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! ! #1#  #!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! !!  WWwBwQ   !!!!#")
+renderLine(06,"#!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!+!  Q                 !!!;:!  BB#WBb   !!OO#")
+renderLine(07,"#!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! ! #2#  #!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! !!  WWBbbQ   !!!!#")
+renderLine(08,"#       !!!    !! !  #  OR   6 ggg!!ggg !! !!  QQbQQQ   !!!o#")
+renderLine(09,"#    Z  bbb vN ww !  Q   R   6 gCg!!g`g ww !!  BBBQQQ   !!!b#")
+renderLine(10,"#  y    bbb vv www!  Q   R   6 g g!!g g www!!  WwwQQQ+  !!! #")
+renderLine(11,"#       !!!    !!!!  Q  OR   6 ggg!!ggg !!!!!  QQQQQQ   www #")
+renderLine(12,"#############################################################")
+
+oxyd_shuffle()
+
+display.SetFollowMode(display.FOLLOW_SCROLLING)

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no" ?>
+<el:level xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://enigma-game.org/schema/level/1 level.xsd" xmlns:el="http://enigma-game.org/schema/level/1">

+    <el:info el:type="level">
+      <el:identity el:title="The Pearl Necklet" el:subtitle="" el:id="duffy175"/>
+      <el:version el:score="1" el:release="1" el:revision="0" el:status="released"/>
+      <el:author  el:name="Jacob Scott" el:email="" el:homepage=""/>
+      <el:copyright>Copyright ? 2007 Jacob Scott</el:copyright>
+      <el:license el:type="GPL v2.0 or above" el:open="true"/>
+      <el:compatibility el:enigma="0.92">
+      </el:compatibility>
+      <el:modes el:easy="false" el:single="true" el:network="false"/>
+      <el:score el:easy="-" el:difficult="-"/>
+    </el:info>
+    <el:luamain><![CDATA[
+rooms_wide=2
+rooms_high=1
+
+levelw=1+(19*rooms_wide)
+levelh=1+(12*rooms_high)
+
+create_world( levelw, levelh)
+enigma.ConserveLevel = 0
+
+fill_floor("fl-black", 0,0,levelw,levelh)
+
+function renderLine( line, pattern)
+    for i=1, strlen(pattern) do
+        local c = strsub( pattern, i, i)
+        if c =="#" then
+            set_stone( "st-rock6", i-1, line)
+        elseif c =="0" then
+            set_stone( "st-greenbrown_move", i-1, line,{name="b0"})
+        elseif c =="1" then
+            set_stone( "st-rock1_move", i-1, line,{name="b1"})
+        elseif c =="2" then
+            set_stone( "st-marble_move", i-1, line,{name="b2"})
+        elseif c =="3" then
+            set_stone( "st-brownie", i-1, line,{name="b3"})
+        elseif c =="4" then
+            set_stone("st-puzzle-nesw",i-1,line,{name="b4"})
+        elseif c =="5" then
+            set_stone( "st-glass_move", i-1, line,{name="b5"})
+        elseif c =="6" then
+            set_stone( "st-wood", i-1, line,{name="b6"})
+        elseif c =="7" then
+            set_stone( "st-shogun-s", i-1, line,{name="b7"})
+        elseif c =="8" then
+            set_stone( "st-rock3_move", i-1, line,{name="b8"})
+        elseif c =="9" then
+            set_stone( "st-block", i-1, line,{name="b9"})
+        elseif c =="k" then
+            set_stone( "st-greenbrown_move", i-1, line)
+        elseif c =="l" then
+            set_stone( "st-rock1_move", i-1, line)
+        elseif c =="m" then
+            set_stone( "st-marble_move", i-1, line)
+        elseif c =="n" then
+            set_stone( "st-brownie", i-1, line)
+        elseif c =="$" then
+            set_stone("st-puzzle-nesw",i-1,line)
+        elseif c =="p" then
+            set_stone( "st-glass_move", i-1, line)
+        elseif c =="q" then
+            set_stone( "st-wood", i-1, line)
+        elseif c =="r" then
+            set_stone( "st-shogun-s", i-1, line)
+        elseif c =="s" then
+            set_stone( "st-rock3_move", i-1, line)
+        elseif c =="t" then
+            set_stone( "st-block", i-1, line)
+        elseif c == "o" then
+            oxyd( i-1, line)
+        elseif c == "*" then
+            set_stone( "st-brownie", i-1, line)
+        elseif c == "!" then
+            abyss(i-1,line)
+        elseif c == "~" then
+            set_floor("fl-water",i-1,line)
+        elseif c=="z" then
+            set_actor("ac-blackball", i-.5,line+.5, {player=0})
+        elseif c=="y" then
+            set_actor("ac-whiteball", i-1,line+.5, {player=1})
+        elseif c == "g" then
+            draw_stones("st-grate1",{i-1,line}, {1,1}, 1)
+        elseif c=="+" then
+            set_stone( "st-wood", i-1, line)
+        elseif c=="=" then
+            set_floor("fl-space",i-1,line)
+        elseif c=="a" then
+            set_item("it-trigger",i-1,line,{action="callback",target="funcca"})
+        elseif c=="b" then
+            set_item("it-trigger",i-1,line,{action="callback",target="funcca"})
+        elseif c=="c" then
+            set_item("it-trigger",i-1,line,{action="callback",target="funcca"})
+        elseif c=="d" then
+            set_item("it-trigger",i-1,line,{action="callback",target="funcca"})
+        elseif c=="e" then
+            set_item("it-trigger",i-1,line,{action="callback",target="funcca"})
+        elseif c=="f" then
+            set_item("it-trigger",i-1,line,{action="callback",target="funcca"})
+        elseif c=="`" then
+            set_item("it-trigger",i-1,line,{action="callback",target="funcca"})
+        elseif c=="h" then
+            set_item("it-trigger",i-1,line,{action="callback",target="funcca"})
+        elseif c=="i" then
+            set_item("it-trigger",i-1,line,{action="callback",target="funcca"})
+        elseif c=="j" then
+            set_item("it-trigger",i-1,line,{action="callback",target="funcca"})
+        elseif c=="A" then
+            set_attrib(laser(i-1,line, FALSE, NORTH), "name", "l1a")
+        elseif c=="B" then
+            set_attrib(laser(i-1,line, FALSE, SOUTH), "name", "l1b")
+        elseif c=="C" then
+            set_attrib(laser(i-1,line, FALSE, NORTH), "name", "l2a")
+        elseif c=="D" then
+            set_attrib(laser(i-1,line, FALSE, SOUTH), "name", "l2b")
+        elseif c=="E" then
+            set_attrib(laser(i-1,line, FALSE, NORTH), "name", "l3a")
+        elseif c=="F" then
+            set_attrib(laser(i-1,line, FALSE, SOUTH), "name", "l3b")
+        elseif c=="G" then
+            set_attrib(laser(i-1,line, FALSE, NORTH), "name", "l4a")
+        elseif c=="H" then
+            set_attrib(laser(i-1,line, FALSE, SOUTH), "name", "l4b")
+        elseif c=="I" then
+            set_attrib(laser(i-1,line, FALSE, NORTH), "name", "l5a")
+        elseif c=="J" then
+            set_attrib(laser(i-1,line, FALSE, SOUTH), "name", "l5b")
+        elseif c=="K" then
+            set_attrib(laser(i-1,line, FALSE, NORTH), "name", "l6a")
+        elseif c=="L" then
+            set_attrib(laser(i-1,line, FALSE, SOUTH), "name", "l6b")
+        elseif c=="M" then
+            set_attrib(laser(i-1,line, FALSE, NORTH), "name", "l7a")
+        elseif c=="N" then
+            set_attrib(laser(i-1,line, FALSE, SOUTH), "name", "l7b")
+        elseif c=="O" then
+            set_attrib(laser(i-1,line, FALSE, NORTH), "name", "l8a")
+        elseif c=="P" then
+            set_attrib(laser(i-1,line, FALSE, SOUTH), "name", "l8b")
+        elseif c=="Q" then
+            set_attrib(laser(i-1,line, FALSE, NORTH), "name", "l9a")
+        elseif c=="R" then
+            set_attrib(laser(i-1,line, FALSE, SOUTH), "name", "l9b")
+        elseif c=="U" then
+           doorv(i-1,line,{name="d1"})
+        end
+    end    
+end
+
+renderLine(00,"#######################################")
+renderLine(01,"#        klmn$pqrst                 #o#")
+renderLine(02,"#                                   # #")
+renderLine(03,"#                                   # #")
+renderLine(04,"#                                   # #")
+renderLine(05,"#    A C E G I K M O Q              # #")
+renderLine(06,"# z a#b#c#d#e#f#`#h#i#j 0123456789  U #")
+renderLine(07,"#    B D F H J L N P R              # #")
+renderLine(08,"#                                   # #")
+renderLine(09,"#                                   # #")
+renderLine(10,"#                                   # #")
+renderLine(11,"#        klmn$pqrst                 #o#")
+renderLine(12,"#######################################")

+oxyd_shuffle()
+
+b0=enigma.GetNamedObject("b0")
+b1=enigma.GetNamedObject("b1")
+b2=enigma.GetNamedObject("b2")
+b3=enigma.GetNamedObject("b3")
+b4=enigma.GetNamedObject("b4")

+b6=enigma.GetNamedObject("b6")
+b7=enigma.GetNamedObject("b7")
+b8=enigma.GetNamedObject("b8")
+b9=enigma.GetNamedObject("b9")

+l1a=enigma.GetNamedObject("l1a")
+l1b=enigma.GetNamedObject("l1b")
+l2a=enigma.GetNamedObject("l2a")
+l2b=enigma.GetNamedObject("l2b")
+l3a=enigma.GetNamedObject("l3a")
+l3b=enigma.GetNamedObject("l3b")
+l4a=enigma.GetNamedObject("l4a")
+l4b=enigma.GetNamedObject("l4b")

+l7b=enigma.GetNamedObject("l7b")

+p0=-1
+p1=-1
+p2=-1
+p3=-1
+p4=-1
+p5=-1
+p6=-1
+p7=-1
+p8=-1
+p9=-1

+function funcccheck()
+    p01=(p0)..(p1)
+    if p01=="10" or p01=="11" or p01=="13" or p01=="14" or p01=="17" or p01=="19" or p01=="22" or p01=="23" or p01=="26" or p01=="29" or p01=="31" or p01=="33" or p01=="34" or p01=="37" or p01=="38" or p01=="39" or p01=="41" or p01=="43" or p01=="46" or p01=="47" or p01=="53" or p01=="58" or p01=="59" or p01=="61" or p01=="62" or p01=="67" or p01=="71" or p01=="73" or p01=="74" or p01=="79" or p01=="82" or p01=="83" or p01=="86" or p01=="89" or p01=="94" or p01=="97" then
+        enigma.SendMessage(l1a,"on",nil)
+        enigma.SendMessage(l1b,"on",nil)
+        c01=1
+    else
+        enigma.SendMessage(l1a,"off",nil)
+        enigma.SendMessage(l1b,"off",nil)
+        c01=0
+    end
+
+    p12=(p1)..(p2)
+    if p12=="02" or p12=="03" or p12=="04"  or p12=="05" or p12=="06" or p12=="07" or p12=="10" or p12=="11" or p12=="13" or p12=="14" or p12=="17" or p12=="19" or p12=="22" or p12=="23" or p12=="26" or p12=="29" or p12=="31" or p12=="33" or p12=="34" or p12=="37" or p12=="38" or p12=="39" or p12=="41" or p12=="43" or p12=="46" or p12=="47" or p12=="53" or p12=="58" or p12=="59" or p12=="61" or p12=="62" or p12=="67" or p12=="71" or p12=="73" or p12=="74" or p12=="79" or p12=="82" or p12=="83" or p12=="86" or p12=="89" or p12=="94" or p12=="97" then
+        enigma.SendMessage(l2a,"on",nil)
+        enigma.SendMessage(l2b,"on",nil)
+        c12=1
+    else
+        enigma.SendMessage(l2a,"off",nil)
+        enigma.SendMessage(l2b,"off",nil)
+        c12=0
+    end
+
+    p23=(p2)..(p3)
+    if p23=="02" or p23=="03" or p23=="04"  or p23=="05" or p23=="06" or p23=="07" or p23=="10" or p23=="11" or p23=="13" or p23=="14" or p23=="17" or p23=="19" or p23=="22" or p23=="23" or p23=="26" or p23=="29" or p23=="31" or p23=="33" or p23=="34" or p23=="37" or p23=="38" or p23=="39" or p23=="41" or p23=="43" or p23=="46" or p23=="47" or p23=="53" or p23=="58" or p23=="59" or p23=="61" or p23=="62" or p23=="67" or p23=="71" or p23=="73" or p23=="74" or p23=="79" or p23=="82" or p23=="83" or p23=="86" or p23=="89" or p23=="94" or p23=="97" then
+        enigma.SendMessage(l3a,"on",nil)
+        enigma.SendMessage(l3b,"on",nil)
+        c23=1
+    else
+        enigma.SendMessage(l3a,"off",nil)
+        enigma.SendMessage(l3b,"off",nil)
+        c23=0
+    end
+
+    p34=(p3)..(p4)
+    if p34=="02" or p34=="03" or p34=="04"  or p34=="05" or p34=="06" or p34=="07" or p34=="10" or p34=="11" or p34=="13" or p34=="14" or p34=="17" or p34=="19" or p34=="22" or p34=="23" or p34=="26" or p34=="29" or p34=="31" or p34=="33" or p34=="34" or p34=="37" or p34=="38" or p34=="39" or p34=="41" or p34=="43" or p34=="46" or p34=="47" or p34=="53" or p34=="58" or p34=="59" or p34=="61" or p34=="62" or p34=="67" or p34=="71" or p34=="73" or p34=="74" or p34=="79" or p34=="82" or p34=="83" or p34=="86" or p34=="89" or p34=="94" or p34=="97" then
+        enigma.SendMessage(l4a,"on",nil)
+        enigma.SendMessage(l4b,"on",nil)
+        c34=1
+    else
+        enigma.SendMessage(l4a,"off",nil)
+        enigma.SendMessage(l4b,"off",nil)
+        c34=0
+    end
+
+    p45=(p4)..(p5)
+    if p45=="02" or p45=="03" or p45=="04"  or p45=="05" or p45=="06" or p45=="07" or p45=="10" or p45=="11" or p45=="13" or p45=="14" or p45=="17" or p45=="19" or p45=="22" or p45=="23" or p45=="26" or p45=="29" or p45=="31" or p45=="33" or p45=="34" or p45=="37" or p45=="38" or p45=="39" or p45=="41" or p45=="43" or p45=="46" or p45=="47" or p45=="53" or p45=="58" or p45=="59" or p45=="61" or p45=="62" or p45=="67" or p45=="71" or p45=="73" or p45=="74" or p45=="79" or p45=="82" or p45=="83" or p45=="86" or p45=="89" or p45=="94" or p45=="97" then
+        enigma.SendMessage(l5a,"on",nil)
+        enigma.SendMessage(l5b,"on",nil)
+        c45=1
+    else
+        enigma.SendMessage(l5a,"off",nil)
+        enigma.SendMessage(l5b,"off",nil)
+        c45=0
+    end
+
+    p56=(p5)..(p6)
+    if p56=="02" or p56=="03" or p56=="04"  or p56=="05" or p56=="06" or p56=="07" or p56=="10" or p56=="11" or p56=="13" or p56=="14" or p56=="17" or p56=="19" or p56=="22" or p56=="23" or p56=="26" or p56=="29" or p56=="31" or p56=="33" or p56=="34" or p56=="37" or p56=="38" or p56=="39" or p56=="41" or p56=="43" or p56=="46" or p56=="47" or p56=="53" or p56=="58" or p56=="59" or p56=="61" or p56=="62" or p56=="67" or p56=="71" or p56=="73" or p56=="74" or p56=="79" or p56=="82" or p56=="83" or p56=="86" or p56=="89" or p56=="94" or p56=="97" then
+        enigma.SendMessage(l6a,"on",nil)
+        enigma.SendMessage(l6b,"on",nil)
+        c56=1
+    else
+        enigma.SendMessage(l6a,"off",nil)
+        enigma.SendMessage(l6b,"off",nil)
+        c56=0
+    end
+
+    p67=(p6)..(p7)
+    if p67=="02" or p67=="03" or p67=="04"  or p67=="05" or p67=="06" or p67=="07" or p67=="10" or p67=="11" or p67=="13" or p67=="14" or p67=="17" or p67=="19" or p67=="22" or p67=="23" or p67=="26" or p67=="29" or p67=="31" or p67=="33" or p67=="34" or p67=="37" or p67=="38" or p67=="39" or p67=="41" or p67=="43" or p67=="46" or p67=="47" or p67=="53" or p67=="58" or p67=="59" or p67=="61" or p67=="62" or p67=="67" or p67=="71" or p67=="73" or p67=="74" or p67=="79" or p67=="82" or p67=="83" or p67=="86" or p67=="89" or p67=="94" or p67=="97" then
+        enigma.SendMessage(l7a,"on",nil)
+        enigma.SendMessage(l7b,"on",nil)
+        c67=1
+    else
+        enigma.SendMessage(l7a,"off",nil)
+        enigma.SendMessage(l7b,"off",nil)
+        c67=0
+    end
+
+    p78=(p7)..(p8)
+    if p78=="02" or p78=="03" or p78=="04"  or p78=="05" or p78=="06" or p78=="07" or p78=="10" or p78=="11" or p78=="13" or p78=="14" or p78=="17" or p78=="19" or p78=="22" or p78=="23" or p78=="26" or p78=="29" or p78=="31" or p78=="33" or p78=="34" or p78=="37" or p78=="38" or p78=="39" or p78=="41" or p78=="43" or p78=="46" or p78=="47" or p78=="53" or p78=="58" or p78=="59" or p78=="61" or p78=="62" or p78=="67" or p78=="71" or p78=="73" or p78=="74" or p78=="79" or p78=="82" or p78=="83" or p78=="86" or p78=="89" or p78=="94" or p78=="97" then
+        enigma.SendMessage(l8a,"on",nil)
+        enigma.SendMessage(l8b,"on",nil)
+        c78=1
+    else
+        enigma.SendMessage(l8a,"off",nil)
+        enigma.SendMessage(l8b,"off",nil)
+        c78=0
+    end
+
+    p89=(p8)..(p9)
+    if p89=="02" or p89=="03" or p89=="04"  or p89=="05" or p89=="06" or p89=="07" or p89=="10" or p89=="11" or p89=="13" or p89=="14" or p89=="17" or p89=="19" or p89=="22" or p89=="23" or p89=="26" or p89=="29" or p89=="31" or p89=="33" or p89=="34" or p89=="37" or p89=="38" or p89=="39" or p89=="41" or p89=="43" or p89=="46" or p89=="47" or p89=="53" or p89=="58" or p89=="59" or p89=="61" or p89=="62" or p89=="67" or p89=="71" or p89=="73" or p89=="74" or p89=="79" or p89=="82" or p89=="83" or p89=="86" or p89=="89" or p89=="94" or p89=="97" then
+        enigma.SendMessage(l9a,"on",nil)
+        enigma.SendMessage(l9b,"on",nil)
+        c89=1
+    else
+        enigma.SendMessage(l9a,"off",nil)
+        enigma.SendMessage(l9b,"off",nil)
+        c89=0
+    end
+
+    if ((c01+c12+c23+c34+c45+c56+c67+c78+c89)==9) then
+        enigma.SendMessage(d1,"open",nil)
+    else
+        enigma.SendMessage(d1,"close",nil)
+    end
+end
+
+function funcca()
+    xx0,yy0=enigma.GetPos(b0)
+    xx1,yy1=enigma.GetPos(b1)
+    xx2,yy2=enigma.GetPos(b2)
+    xx3,yy3=enigma.GetPos(b3)
+    xx4,yy4=enigma.GetPos(b4)
+    xx5,yy5=enigma.GetPos(b5)
+    xx6,yy6=enigma.GetPos(b6)
+    xx7,yy7=enigma.GetPos(b7)
+    xx8,yy8=enigma.GetPos(b8)
+    xx9,yy9=enigma.GetPos(b9)
+
+    if not((xx0==4 and yy0==6) or (xx1==4 and yy1==6) or (xx2==4 and yy2==6) or (xx3==4 and yy3==6) or (xx4==4 and yy4==6) or (xx5==4 and yy5==6) or (xx6==4 and yy6==6) or (xx7==4 and yy7==6) or (xx8==4 and yy8==6) or (xx9==4 and yy9==6)) then
+        p0=-1
+    end
+    if not((xx0==6 and yy0==6) or (xx1==6 and yy1==6) or (xx2==6 and yy2==6) or (xx3==6 and yy3==6) or (xx4==6 and yy4==6) or (xx5==6 and yy5==6) or (xx6==6 and yy6==6) or (xx7==6 and yy7==6) or (xx8==6 and yy8==6) or (xx9==6 and yy9==6)) then
+        p1=-1
+    end
+    if not((xx0==8 and yy0==6) or (xx1==8 and yy1==6) or (xx2==8 and yy2==6) or (xx3==8 and yy3==6) or (xx4==8 and yy4==6) or (xx5==8 and yy5==6) or (xx6==8 and yy6==6) or (xx7==8 and yy7==6) or (xx8==8 and yy8==6) or (xx9==8 and yy9==6)) then
+        p2=-1
+    end
+    if not((xx0==10 and yy0==6) or (xx1==10 and yy1==6) or (xx2==10 and yy2==6) or (xx3==10 and yy3==6) or (xx4==10 and yy4==6) or (xx5==10 and yy5==6) or (xx6==10 and yy6==6) or (xx7==10 and yy7==6) or (xx8==10 and yy8==6) or (xx9==10 and yy9==6)) then
+        p3=-1
+    end
+    if not((xx0==12 and yy0==6) or (xx1==12 and yy1==6) or (xx2==12 and yy2==6) or (xx3==12 and yy3==6) or (xx4==12 and yy4==6) or (xx5==12 and yy5==6) or (xx6==12 and yy6==6) or (xx7==12 and yy7==6) or (xx8==12 and yy8==6) or (xx9==12 and yy9==6)) then
+        p4=-1
+    end
+    if not((xx0==14 and yy0==6) or (xx1==14 and yy1==6) or (xx2==14 and yy2==6) or (xx3==14 and yy3==6) or (xx4==14 and yy4==6) or (xx5==14 and yy5==6) or (xx6==14 and yy6==6) or (xx7==14 and yy7==6) or (xx8==14 and yy8==6) or (xx9==14 and yy9==6)) then
+        p5=-1
+    end
+    if not((xx0==16 and yy0==6) or (xx1==16 and yy1==6) or (xx2==16 and yy2==6) or (xx3==16 and yy3==6) or (xx4==16 and yy4==6) or (xx5==16 and yy5==6) or (xx6==16 and yy6==6) or (xx7==16 and yy7==6) or (xx8==16 and yy8==6) or (xx9==16 and yy9==6)) then
+        p6=-1
+    end
+    if not((xx0==18 and yy0==6) or (xx1==18 and yy1==6) or (xx2==18 and yy2==6) or (xx3==18 and yy3==6) or (xx4==18 and yy4==6) or (xx5==18 and yy5==6) or (xx6==18 and yy6==6) or (xx7==18 and yy7==6) or (xx8==18 and yy8==6) or (xx9==18 and yy9==6)) then
+        p7=-1
+    end
+    if not((xx0==20 and yy0==6) or (xx1==20 and yy1==6) or (xx2==20 and yy2==6) or (xx3==20 and yy3==6) or (xx4==20 and yy4==6) or (xx5==20 and yy5==6) or (xx6==20 and yy6==6) or (xx7==20 and yy7==6) or (xx8==20 and yy8==6) or (xx9==20 and yy9==6)) then
+        p8=-1
+    end
+    if not((xx0==22 and yy0==6) or (xx1==22 and yy1==6) or (xx2==22 and yy2==6) or (xx3==22 and yy3==6) or (xx4==22 and yy4==6) or (xx5==22 and yy5==6) or (xx6==22 and yy6==6) or (xx7==22 and yy7==6) or (xx8==22 and yy8==6) or (xx9==22 and yy9==6)) then
+        p9=-1
+    end
+    if xx0==4 and yy0==6 then
+        p0=0
+    end
+    if xx0==6 and yy0==6 then
+        p1=0
+    end

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no" ?>
+<el:level xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://enigma-game.org/schema/level/1 level.xsd" xmlns:el="http://enigma-game.org/schema/level/1">

+    <el:info el:type="level">
+      <el:identity el:title="Ghost Driver" el:subtitle="Take the first exit" el:id="duffy176"/>
+      <el:version el:score="1" el:release="1" el:revision="0" el:status="released"/>
+      <el:author  el:name="Jacob Scott" el:email="" el:homepage=""/>
+      <el:copyright>Copyright ? 2007 Jacob Scott</el:copyright>
+      <el:license el:type="GPL v2.0 or above" el:open="true"/>
+      <el:compatibility el:enigma="0.92">
+      </el:compatibility>
+      <el:modes el:easy="false" el:single="true" el:network="false"/>
+      <el:score el:easy="-" el:difficult="-"/>
+    </el:info>
+    <el:luamain><![CDATA[
+rooms_wide=1
+rooms_high=8
+
+levelw=1+(19*rooms_wide)
+levelh=1+(12*rooms_high)
+
+create_world(levelw, levelh)
+enigma.ConserveLevel = 0
+
+fill_floor("fl-hay", 0,0, level_width,level_height)
+
+function renderLine( line, pattern)
+    for i=1, strlen(pattern) do
+        local c = strsub( pattern, i, i)
+        if c =="#" then
+            set_stone("st-greenbrown",i-1,line)
+        elseif c == "o" then
+            oxyd( i-1, line)
+        elseif c == "s" then
+            set_stone("st-stoneimpulse",i-1,line)
+        elseif c == "*" then
+            set_stone("st-brownie", i-1, line)
+         elseif c == "d" then
+            set_stone("st-bolder", i-1,line, {direction=SOUTH})
+        elseif c == "u" then
+            set_stone("st-bolder", i-1,line, {direction=NORTH})
+        elseif c == "l" then
+            set_stone("st-bolder", i-1,line, {direction=WEST})
+        elseif c == "!" then
+            set_floor("fl-water",i-1,line)
+        elseif c == "z" then    
+            set_actor("ac-blackball" ,i-1, line, {player=0})
+        end
+    end
+end
+
+enigma.AddConstantForce(0,90)
+
+-- Floor:  " "
+-- Border: "#"
+-- Oxyd:   "o"
+renderLine(00,"#############")
+renderLine(01,"#dddddd#d d #")
+renderLine(02,"#       * * #")
+renderLine(03,"#   d  #    #")
+renderLine(04,"#      #    #")
+renderLine(05,"# d   d#    #")
+renderLine(06,"#      # #  #")
+renderLine(07,"#d     #    #")
+renderLine(08,"#      #    #")
+renderLine(09,"#   d  #    #")
+renderLine(10,"#      #    #")
+renderLine(11,"#      #   ##")
+renderLine(12,"#      #    #")
+renderLine(13,"#d     #    #")
+renderLine(14,"#  d dd#    #")
+renderLine(15,"#      #   ##")
+renderLine(16,"#      #    #")
+renderLine(17,"#d    d#    #")
+renderLine(18,"#      #    #")
+renderLine(19,"#    d #    #")
+renderLine(20,"#d    d#    #")
+renderLine(21,"#      #    #")
+renderLine(22,"# d    #    #")
+renderLine(23,"#      # #  #")
+renderLine(24,"#      #    #")
+renderLine(25,"# d   d#    #")
+renderLine(26,"#      #    #")

+renderLine(29,"#   d d#    #")
+renderLine(30,"#d    d#    #")

+renderLine(43,"#   d  #    #")
+renderLine(44,"#      # # ##")
+renderLine(45,"#      # # ########")
+renderLine(46,"#     d#          #")
+renderLine(47,"#      #          #")
+renderLine(48,"#  d   #!# #  ###s#")

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no" ?>
+<el:level xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
+xsi:schemaLocation="http://enigma-game.org/schema/level/1 level.xsd"
+xmlns:el="http://enigma-game.org/schema/level/1">
+  <el:protected >
+    <el:info el:type="level">
+      <el:identity el:title="Not Fast Enough" el:id="20070413jet001"/>
+      <el:version el:score="3" el:release="3" el:revision="3" el:status="released"/>
+      <el:author el:name="James Taylor, Ronald Lamprecht" el:email="james at lab6.com"/>
+      <el:copyright>Copyright ? 2007 James Taylor, Ronald Lamprecht</el:copyright>
+      <el:license el:type="GPL v2.0 or above" el:open="true"/>
+      <el:compatibility el:enigma="1.00">
+       <el:dependency el:path="lib/ant" el:id="lib/ant" el:release="1" el:preload="true"/>
+      </el:compatibility>
+      <el:modes el:easy="true" el:single="true" el:network="false"/>
+      <el:comments>
+       <el:credits el:showinfo="true" el:showstart="false">Thanks to Raoul for playtesting</el:credits>
+       <el:code>The easymode is the original level from James Taylor. The diffs for the difficult mode are added by Ronald Lamprecht.</el:code>
+      </el:comments>
+      <el:score el:easy="-" el:difficult="4:48"/>
+    </el:info>
+    <el:luamain><![CDATA[
+enigma.ConserveLevel = 0
+
+cells={}
+
+    cells[" "] = cell{floor="fl-plank"}
+    cells["."] = cell{floor="fl-abyss"}
+    cells["#"] = cell{stone="st-redrock"}
+    cells["v"] = cell{floor="fl-plank", item="it-crack3"}
+    cells["u"] = cell{item="it-umbrella"}
+    cells["s"] = cell{item="it-seed"}
+    cells["T"] = cell{item={"it-trigger", {action="openclose", target="door1"}}}
+    cells["U"] = cell{item={"it-trigger", {action="openclose", target="door2"}}}
+    cells["V"] = cell{item={"it-trigger", {action="openclose", target="door3"}}}
+    cells["X"] = cell{item={"it-trigger", {action="openclose", target="door4"}}}
+    cells["Y"] = cell{item={"it-trigger", {action="openclose", target="door5"}}}
+    cells["g"] = cell{stone="st-grate1"}
+    cells["G"] = cell{item="it-seed"}
+    cells["t"] = cell{stone="st-turnstile"}
+    cells["n"] = cell{stone="st-turnstile-n"}
+    cells["S"] = cell{stone="st-swap"}
+    cells["a"] = cell{stone="st-puzzle-n"}
+    cells["b"] = cell{stone="st-puzzle-s"}
+    cells["c"] = cell{stone="st-puzzle-es"}
+    cells[","] = cell{stone="st-puzzle-w"}
+    cells["1"] = cell{stone={"st-door-v", {name="door1"}}}
+    cells["2"] = cell{floor={"fl-bridge-closed", {name="door2", type="y"}}}
+    cells["3"] = cell{floor={"fl-bridge-closed", {name="door3", type="y"}}}
+    cells["4"] = cell{floor={"fl-bridge-closed", {name="door4", type="y"}}}
+    cells["d"] = cell{stone={"st-door-h", {name="finaldoor"}}}
+    cells["l"] = cell{stone={"st-coinslot", {action="openclose", target="finaldoor"}}}
+    cells["W"] = cell{stone={"st-switch", {action="callback", target="doorworks"}}}
+    cells["D"] = cell{stone={"st-door-h", {name="firstdoor"}}}
+    cells["L"] = cell{stone={"st-laser-e", {name="laser1"}}}
+    cells["w"] = cell{stone="st-wood"}
+    cells["}"] = cell{floor="fl-water"}
+
+if difficult then
+    cells["K"] = cell{stone="st-knight"}
+    cells["-"] = cell{floor="fl-water",item="it-hstrip"}
+    cells["H"] = cell{stone="st-wood"}
+    cells["Z"] = cell{item={"it-trigger", {action="callback", target="laserworks"}}}
+    cells["C"] = cell{item="it-coin2"}
+    cells[">"] = cell{stone="st-oneway-e"}
+    cells["5"] = cell{stone={"st-door-v", {name="door5"}}, item="it-coin1"}
+    cells["6"] = cell{floor={"fl-bridge-closed", {name="door6", type="y"}}}
+    cells["7"] = cell{floor={"fl-bridge-open", {name="door7", type="y"}}}
+    cells["8"] = cell{floor={"fl-bridge-closed", {name="door8", type="y"}}}
+else
+    cells["Z"] = cell{item={"it-trigger", {action="on", target="laser1"}}}
+    cells["C"] = cell{item="it-coin1"}
+    cells[">"] = cell{stone="st-oneway-e", item="it-coin1"}
+    cells["5"] = cell{stone={"st-door-v", {name="door5"}}}
+end
+
+function doorworks()
+    enigma.SendMessage(enigma.GetNamedObject("firstdoor"), "openclose", nil)
+    enigma.SendMessage(enigma.GetNamedObject("door2"), "open", nil)
+    enigma.SendMessage(enigma.GetNamedObject("door3"), "open", nil)
+    enigma.SendMessage(enigma.GetNamedObject("door4"), "open", nil)
+end
+
+function laserworks()
+    enigma.SendMessage(enigma.GetNamedObject("laser1"), "onoff", nil)
+    enigma.SendMessage(enigma.GetNamedObject("door6"), "openclose", nil)
+    enigma.SendMessage(enigma.GetNamedObject("door7"), "openclose", nil)
+    enigma.SendMessage(enigma.GetNamedObject("door8"), "openclose", nil)
+end
+
+if difficult then
+    level = {
+    "##################0#",
+    "##TU#V#XY##Z#   Ol 0",
+    "#}}}}}}}}}#H# }###d#",
+    "#}}}}}}}}}#    # - #",
+    "# G G G G # #6 # }}#",
+    "# # # # # Wv#  # - #",
+    "# a b   a #v# 7#}} #",
+    "# b# ab#, #v#  # - #",
+    "#  w      #v#8 #K###",
+    "#gcnbaggg #DL      #",
+    "#ggggggSgv  ###### #",
+    "#gggggggt # 12345>C#",
+    "####################"
+    }
+else
+    level = {
+    "##################0#",
+    "##TU#V#XY##Z#   Ol 0",
+    "#}}}}}}}}}#w# }###d#",
+    "#}}}}}}}}}#    #   #",
+    "# G G G G # #} # }}#",
+    "# # # # # Wv#  #   #",
+    "# a b   a #v# }#}} #",
+    "# b# ab#, #v#  #   #",
+    "#  w      #v#} # }}#",
+    "#gcnbaggg # L      #",
+    "#ggggggSgv  ######D#",
+    "#gggggggt # 12345>C#",
+    "####################"
+    }
+end
+
+    oxyd_default_flavor = "a"
+    set_default_parent(cells[" "])
+    create_world_by_map(level)
+
+    ]]></el:luamain>
+    <el:i18n>
+      <el:string el:key="title">
+        <el:english el:translate="false"/>
+      </el:string>
+    </el:i18n>
+  </el:protected>
+</el:level>

+enigma.ConserveLevel = 0
+
+create_world(191, 97)
+oxyd_default_flavor="b"
+
+-- Code
+homex=63.5
+homey=38.5
+finishx=136.5
+finishy=90.5
+xx=0
+
+function start_timing()
+    if xx == 0 then
+        set_item("it-wormhole", 136, 90, {targetx=175.5, targety=90.5})
+        xx=1
+    else
+        enigma.KillItem(136,90)
+        enigma.KillStone(135,89)
+        enigma.KillStone(136,89)
+        enigma.KillStone(137,89)
+        enigma.KillStone(135,90)
+        enigma.KillStone(137,90)
+        enigma.KillStone(135,91)
+        enigma.KillStone(136,91)
+        enigma.KillStone(137,91)
+        SendMessage("timer1","off")
+    end
+end
+
+function puzzle1()
+    puzzle({" #     ", 
+          "###### ", 
+          " ## ###", 
+          " ##### ", 
+          "    #  "}, {41,39}, "redpuzzle", "permutation")
+end
+
+function refill()
+    local water = 0
+    local floor = enigma.GetFloor(131, 18)
+    local water1 = false
+    local water2 = false
+    local water3 = false
+    if floor ~= nil then
+        if GetKind(floor) == "fl-water" then
+            water = water + 1
+            water1 = true
+        end
+    end
+    floor = enigma.GetFloor(131, 19)
+    if floor ~= nil then
+        if GetKind(floor) == "fl-water" then
+            water = water + 1
+            water2 = true
+        end
+    end
+    floor = enigma.GetFloor(132, 19)
+    if floor ~= nil then
+        if GetKind(floor) == "fl-water" then
+            water = water + 1
+            water3 = true
+        end
+    end
+    if water > 0 then
+        local obj = enigma.GetItem(132, 18)
+        local didFill = 0
+        if obj == nil then
+            if water == 3 then
+                set_item("it-document", 132, 18, {text="text13"})
+            end
+        else
+            if GetKind(obj) == "it-extinguisher_empty" then
+                set_item("it-extinguisher_medium", 132, 18, {})
+                water = water -1
+                didFill = 1
+            else
+                if GetKind(obj) == "it-extinguisher_medium" and water > 1 then
+                    set_item("it-extinguisher", 132, 18, {})
+                    water = water - 2
+                    didFill = 2
+                end
+            end
+        end
+        if didFill >= 1 and water1 then
+            set_floor("fl-swamp", 131, 18, {})
+            didFill = didFill - 1
+        end
+        if didFill >= 1 and water2 then
+            set_floor("fl-swamp", 131, 19, {})
+            didFill = didFill - 1
+        end
+        if didFill >= 1 and water3 then
+            set_floor("fl-swamp", 132, 19, {})
+        end
+    end
+end
+
+function fire()

+        draw_floor("fl-leavesb", {77, x}, {1, 0}, 39, {burnable=false})
+    end 
+    SetDefaultAttribs("fl-leaves", {eternal=true, burnable=true, initfire=true})

+function random_hole()
+    rnd = random(136, 149)
+    set_stone("st-bluegray_hole", rnd, 18)
+    set_item("it-document", rnd, 14, {text="text5"})
+end

+f1 = 0
+f2 = 0
+f3 = 0
+f4 = 0
+f5 = 0
+f6 = 0
+
+function door_99_f1()
+    if f1 == 0 then
+        f1 = 1
+    else
+        f1 = 0
+    end
+    if f1 == 1 and f2 == 1 and f3 == 1 and f4 == 1 and f5 == 1 and f6 == 1 then
+        SendMessage ("door99", "open")
+    else
+        SendMessage ("door99", "close")
+    end
+end
+

+
+-- Floor Layer
+fill_floor("fl-bumps")
+fill_floor("fl-water", 16, 1, 3, 3)
+draw_floor("fl-water", {17, 4}, {1, 0}, 2)
+
+-- Item Layer
+set_item("it-seed", 4, 3)
+set_item("it-seed", 10, 7)
+set_item("it-glasses", 5, 8)
+set_item("it-shogun-l", 9, 10, {target="laser1", action="onoff"})
+
+-- Stone Layer
+oxyd(18, 11)
+oxyd(1, 11)
+oxyd(18, 1)
+oxyd(1, 1)
+draw_border("st-stone2")
+draw_stones("st-stone2", {16, 1}, {0, 1}, 3)
+draw_stones("st-stone2", {15, 2}, {0, 1}, 2)
+draw_border("st-stone2", 4, 7, 3, 3)
+set_stone("st-death_invisible", 18, 2)
+set_stone("st-shogun-s", 13, 7)
+set_stone("st-shogun-m", 15, 1)
+set_stone("st-shogun-l", 4, 3)
+set_stone("st-swap", 11, 5)
+set_stone("st-pull", 15, 6)
+set_stone("st-laser-n", 9, 4, {name="laser1", on="0"})
+set_stone("st-stoneimpulse_movable", 3, 6)
+set_stone("st-grate1", 11, 9)
+set_stone("st-rotator_move-right", 16, 9)
+if difficult then
+    set_stone("st-stone2", 7, 1)
+    set_stone("st-mirror-3<tm", 6, 5)
+else
+    set_stone("st-bolder-n", 7, 1)
+    set_stone("st-mirror-3<t", 6, 5)
+end
+
+-- Actor Layer
+set_actor("ac-blackball", 11.5, 9.5, {player="0", mouseforce="1"})
+
+oxyd_shuffle()
+  ]]></el:luamain>
+    <el:i18n>
+     <el:string el:key="title">
+       <el:english el:translate="false"/>
+     </el:string>

+function puzzle1()

+            "# ###",
+            "###+#",
+            "#### "}, {13, 7}, "redpuzzle", "permutation")
+    set_stone("st-puzzle2-hollow", 16, 9)
+end
+
+function bridges()
+     SendMessage("bridge1", "openclose")
+     SendMessage("bridge2", "openclose")
+end
+
+-- Floor Layer
+fill_floor("fl-himalaya")
+set_floor("fl-bridge", 1, 2, {name="bridge1"})
+set_floor("fl-bridge", 2, 2, {name="bridge2"})

+set_item("it-trigger", 8, 12, {action="openclose", target="door3"})
+set_item("it-trigger", 10, 12, {action="openclose", target="door2"})
+set_item("it-trigger", 17, 1, {action="openclose", target="door1"})
+

+draw_stones("st-brick", {15, 1}, {1, 1}, 2)

+draw_stones("st-brick", {19, 2}, {0, 1}, 11)

+cells["x"]=cell{stone="st-grate1"}
+cells["0"]=cell{parent={{file_oxyd,"a"}}}
+
+level={"bbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbb",
+       "b0o o oOooo ooo oo0b",
+       "bOOOObob bbbObObOOOb",
+       "b   o oboOO o o o ob",
+       "boOOObOOo   ObObObob",
+       "bo    o OOOOObOOObob",
+       "bOOOOOowl   o      b",
+       "b      OOOOOOOOwObob",
+       "boOOwObowo    OOOOob",
+       "bo ooOootOOOOx o xxb",
+       "bOOb b www  OowOwOOb",
+       "b0oooO oooooO oooo0b",
+       "bbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbb"}
+
+set_default_parent(cells[" "])
+draw_map(0,0,level,cells)
+
+set_actor("ac-blackball",9.5,6.5,{player=0,name="bb"})
+oxyd_shuffle()
+
+function addimpulse()
+    set_stone("st-stoneimpulse-hollow",8,6)
+end
+    ]]></el:luamain>

+

+    cells[" "]=cell{floor="fl-gradient14"}

+    cells["f"]=cell{actor={"ac-horse", {name="footL"}},floor="fl-gradient13"}

+cells["#"]=cell{stone={"st-door_a", {name="Door3"}},floor="fl-bluegreen"}
+cells["$"]=cell{stone={"st-door_a", {name="Door4"}},floor="fl-bluegreen"}
+cells["%"]=cell{stone={"st-door_a", {name="Door5"}},floor="fl-bluegreen"}
+cells[")"]=cell{stone={"st-door_a", {name="Door6"}},floor="fl-bluegreen"}
+cells["&"]=cell{stone={"st-door_a", {name="Door7"}},floor="fl-bluegreen"}
+cells["*"]=cell{stone={"st-door_a", {name="Door8"}},floor="fl-bluegreen"}

+cells["9"]=cell{item={face="it-trigger",attr={action="openclose",target="Door9"}},floor="fl-bluegreen"}

+level={"W0ggggg2ANBggggggg0W",
+       "Wbg H E^ S  e h  (bW",
+       "Wbg   1     8    gbW",
+       "Wbg   ^     ^    gbW",
+       "Wbg        9     gbW",
+       "W%g   K4 P3^k    g$W",
+       "W at g    ^  7      g&W",
+       "Wbg       ^ 5    gbW",

+<el:level xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://enigma-game.org/schema/level/1 level.xsd" xmlns:el="http://enigma-game.org/schema/level/1">

+      <el:author  el:name="Ronald Lamprecht" el:email="ral at users.berlios.de"/>
+      <el:copyright>Copyright ? 2006 Ronald Lamprecht</el:copyright>
+      <el:license el:type="GPL v2.0 or above" el:open="true"/>
+      <el:compatibility el:enigma="1.00">
+      </el:compatibility>
+      <el:modes el:easy="true" el:single="true" el:network="false"/>
+      <el:comments>
+        <el:code>Lua 5.1</el:code>
+      </el:comments>
+      <el:score el:easy="0:26" el:difficult="0:47"/>
+    </el:info>
+    <el:luamain><![CDATA[
+enigma.ConserveLevel = TRUE
+math_floor = floor
+
+set_oxyd = oxyd
+
+function oxyd( x, y, tiles )
+    return set_oxyd( x, y )
+end
+
+function nothing(x, y, tiles)
+    -- create nothing
+end
+
+function horizontal_bolder(x,y,tiles)
+    if random() >= 0.5 then
+        return set_stone( "st-bolder-w", x, y )
+    else
+        return set_stone( "st-bolder-e", x, y )
+    end
+end
+
+function vertical_bolder(x,y,tiles)
+    if random() >= 0.5 then
+        return set_stone( "st-bolder-n", x, y )
+    else
+        return set_stone( "st-bolder-s", x, y )
+    end
+end
+
+function checkerboard_floor( type1, type2, attribs1, attribs2 )
+    return function( x, y, tiles )
+        if mod(x,2) == mod(y,2) then
+            return set_floor( type1, x, y, attribs1 or {} )
+        else
+            return set_floor( type2, x, y, attribs2 or {} )
+        end
+    end
+end
+
+function floor( floor_type, attribs )
+    return function( x, y, tiles )
+        return set_floor( floor_type, x, y, attribs or {} )
+    end
+end
+
+function stone( stone_type, attribs )
+    return function( x, y, tiles )
+        return set_stone( stone_type, x, y, attribs or {} )
+    end
+end
+
+function item( item_type, attribs )
+    return function( x, y, tiles )
+        return set_item( item_type, x, y, attribs or {} )
+    end
+end
+
+function actor( actor_type, attribs )
+    return function( x, y, tiles )
+        return set_actor( actor_type, x+0.5, y+0.5, attribs or {} )
+    end
+end
+
+function gradient( gradient_type )
+    return function( x, y, tiles )
+        return set_floor( "fl-gradient", x, y, {type=gradient_type} )
+    end
+end
+
+function inherit(tile_type)
+    return function( x, y, tiles )
+        return create_tile( tiles, x, y, tile_type )
+    end
+end
+
+function group( array, constructor )
+    return function( x, y, tiles )
+        object = constructor( x, y, tiles )
+        tinsert( array, object )
+        return object
+    end
+end
+
+function difficulty( d, constructor )
+    if options.Difficulty == d then
+        return constructor
+    else
+        return nothing
+    end
+end
+
+function create_world_from_map( tiles, map )
+    create_world( strlen(map[1]), getn(map) )
+
+    for y = 1,getn(map) do
+        local line = map[y]
+        for x = 1,strlen(line) do
+            local tile = strchar(strbyte(line,x))
+            create_tile( tiles, x-1, y-1, tile )
+        end
+    end
+end
+
+function create_tile( tiles, x, y, tile_type )
+    local constructors = tiles[tile_type]
+
+    if constructors then
+    for i = 1,getn(constructors) do
+        constructors[i](x,y,tiles)
+    end
+    else
+    error("invalid tile identifier " .. tile_type )
+    end
+end
+
+tiles = {}
+tiles[" "] = {floor("fl-swamp")}
+tiles["#"] = {inherit(" "), stone("st-wood")}
+if difficult then
+  enigma.SwampSinkSpeed = 2.5
+  tiles["."] = {inherit(" "), item("it-hollow")}
+  tiles["1"] = {inherit(" "), actor("ac-whiteball-small", {essential=1, player=0, controllers=1})}
+  tiles["*"] = tiles[" "]
+  tiles["2"] = tiles[" "]
+else
+  enigma.SwampSinkSpeed = 1.5
+  tiles["*"] = {inherit(" "), item("it-hollow")}
+  tiles["2"] = {inherit(" "), actor("ac-whiteball-small", {essential=1, player=0, controllers=1})}
+  tiles["."] = tiles[" "]
+  tiles["1"] = tiles[" "]
+end
+
+create_world_from_map( tiles, {
+"####################",
+"#                  #",
+"# .              . #",
+"#  *            *  #",
+"#                  #",
+"#      2    2      #",
+"#       1111       #",
+"#      2    2      #",
+"#                  #",
+"#  *            *  #",
+"# .              . #",
+"#                  #",
+"####################"
+})
+
+    ]]></el:luamain>
+    <el:i18n>
+      <el:string el:key="title">
+        <el:english el:translate="true"/>
+        <el:translation el:lang="de">Ruhelose Meditation</el:translation>
+      </el:string>
+      <el:string el:key="subtitle">
+        <el:english el:translate="true"/>
+        <el:translation el:lang="de">Vorsicht - Treibsand!</el:translation>
+      </el:string>
+    </el:i18n>
+  </el:protected>
+</el:level>
+


Property changes on: branches/1.0/data/levels/enigma_vii/ral09_1.xml
